relationships.description: Chief Investment Officer and Head of Investment Strategy
Worked together on global strategy team

analysis.purpose: Provide investment market commentary and strategy outlook for J.P. Morgan Private Bank clients
analysis.significance: Official investment guidance from J.P. Morgan's Chief Investment Officer managing $800+ billion in assets

notable_quotes: "There is nothing more humbling than writing down and clearly explaining what you think, and why, about the world and markets."

"The United States just ran a national election where an estimated $6 billion was spent campaigning. The result across Congress, state governorships and the presidential popular vote was effectively a 50/50 split."

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - this is standard investment commentary

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is legitimate financial market analysis

details: References to media coverage of elections
Mentions appearances on CNBC, CNN, Bloomberg News
Commentaries appeared in Financial Times, NY Times, WSJ

public_knowledge.context: Standard investment commentary from major financial institution - typical public market analysis

analysis.summary: Richard Madigan, Chief Investment Officer of J.P. Morgan Private Bank, provides a November 2012 market outlook discussing post-election uncertainty, global economic recovery trends, and investment strategy focusing on credit markets and emerging markets while analyzing portfolio diversification and inflation concerns.
